## Collections.ISimpleConvertingCollector type

A [ConvertingCollector](./ts-utils.collections.convertingcollector.md) with non-branded `string` key and `number` index, and transformation of source items.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ISimpleConvertingCollector<TITEM extends ICollectible<string, number>, TSRC> = ConvertingCollector<string, number, TITEM, TSRC>;
```
